Class CreateFileFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      • com.munger.passwordkeeper.view.CreateFileFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener

    public class CreateFileFragment
extends android.support.v4.app.Fragment
    User interface used to gather information in creating a new passwordDocument
